description: General research tools for internet search and expert witness verification

tools.name: internet_search
tools.description: Web search using Tavily API. Search for legal research, medical literature, expert witnesses, case law, news, current events, or general information.
examples: python /Tools/research/internet_search.py "Kentucky statute of limitations personal injury"
when_to_use: Research legal statutes and case law
Find medical literature and research papers
Research expert witnesses and their qualifications
Monitor news about defendants or cases
Find current information on any topic
Verify facts or get multiple sources

tools.name: expert_witness_lookup
tools.description: Look up expert witness publication record, h-index, citation counts, and credentials using Semantic Scholar Author Search.
when_to_use: Verify expert witness credentials before hiring
Check publication quality via citation counts
